page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: OXFORD HOUSE SCHOOL, COLCHESTER. The following pupils in Form V: Hayley Bond, Christopher Slade, Paul Sumner, Traer Scot Simmonds, Jayne Dingemans, Sharon Searle, Louise Melley, Ruth Forrest, John Griffin & Esther Ratcliffe. In Form IV: Daniel Brown, Rebecca Exton, Justin Shreeve, Matthew Gwinnell, Matthew Waylett, Amber Norrington, Dominic Howkins, Jennifer Lord, Timothy Bidgood, Rachel Cameron & Zara Ratcliffe. Nathalie Nunn, a past pupil, was of enormous help with the survey recording. Mr Roxby masterminded the whole project and the Principal, Mr Spendlove assisted and learnt a great deal about computers!
